languages.text: "После того, как ледышка спустился на Кьяву Гамма ради своей миссии, мои шепотки при виде дознавателя ведут себя странно. В толк не возьму, что именно изменилось, но... просто странно".

"Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."
languages.original_text: "После того, как ледышка спустился на Кьяву Гамма ради своей миссии, мои шепотки при виде дознавателя ведут себя странно. В толк не возьму, что именно изменилось, но... просто странно".

traits.locale_text: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."

traits.locale_text: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."

traits.locale_text: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “自从冰人儿完成了基亚瓦伽马星的任务之后，每当他出现在我身边，我那些小小的低语者都会变得一反常态。我不太清楚究竟是什么事情发生了变化，但……这实在是太古怪了。”
languages.original_text: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."

traits.locale_text: “自从冰人儿完成了基亚瓦伽马星的任务之后，每当他出现在我身边，我那些小小的低语者都会变得一反常态。我不太清楚究竟是什么事情发生了变化，但……这实在是太古怪了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Depuis que le rabat-joie s'est rendu sur Kiava Gamma pour sa mission, mes petites voix agissent bizarrement quand il est dans les parages. Je ne saurais pas dire exactement ce qui a changé, mais... c'est bizarre. »
languages.original_text: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis que le rabat-joie s'est rendu sur Kiava Gamma pour sa mission, mes petites voix agissent bizarrement quand il est dans les parages. Je ne saurais pas dire exactement ce qui a changé, mais... c'est bizarre. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Desde que el hombre de hielo bajó a Kiava Gamma por su misión, mis pequeños susurros se comportan extrañamente cuando está cerca. No sé lo que ha cambiado, pero... es raro».
languages.original_text: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."

traits.locale_text: «Desde que el hombre de hielo bajó a Kiava Gamma por su misión, mis pequeños susurros se comportan extrañamente cuando está cerca. No sé lo que ha cambiado, pero... es raro».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「氷の君が任務のためキアヴァ・ガンマに降り立ってからずっとよ、私の小さな囁きは、彼が周囲にいるときはいつだって妙な振る舞いを見せてる。何が変わったのか完全にはわからない、でも…とにかくおかしいのよ」
languages.original_text: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."

traits.locale_text: 「氷の君が任務のためキアヴァ・ガンマに降り立ってからずっとよ、私の小さな囁きは、彼が周囲にいるときはいつだって妙な振る舞いを見せてる。何が変わったのか完全にはわからない、でも…とにかくおかしいのよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Seit der Eismann sich für seine Mission nach Kiava Gamma begeben hat, verhalten sich meine kleinen Flüsterer in seiner Nähe äußerst merkwürdig. Ich kann nicht genau sagen, was sich verändert hat, doch ... es ist einfach merkwürdig."
languages.original_text: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."

traits.locale_text: "Seit der Eismann sich für seine Mission nach Kiava Gamma begeben hat, verhalten sich meine kleinen Flüsterer in seiner Nähe äußerst merkwürdig. Ich kann nicht genau sagen, was sich verändert hat, doch ... es ist einfach merkwürdig."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."

languages.text: "Minik fısıldayanlarım, buz küpü vazife için Kiava Gama'ya indiğinden beri o etraftayken garip davranıyor. Neyin değiştiğini de tam anlayamadım... Çok tuhaf."
languages.original_text: "Ever since the iceman went down to Kiava Gamma for his mission, my little whisperers have been behaving oddly whenever he's around. I can't quite figure out what's changed, but... it's just strange."

traits.locale_text: "Minik fısıldayanlarım, buz küpü vazife için Kiava Gama'ya indiğinden beri o etraftayken garip davranıyor. Neyin değiştiğini de tam anlayamadım... Çok tuhaf."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
